channel.title: Error i need help with
channel.description:
when i was coding my server it was fine but when i let people on it it decided to go stupid on my and on the runserver window i get this when someone lags
[code]Welcome Back Cody! Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43595 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1072 Client type: low memory version UserId: 45620747 pr1v4cy is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.writeString(stream.java:232) at NPC.appendNPCUpdateBlock(NPC.java:85) at Player.addNewNPC(Player.java:652) at PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHandler.java:259) at client.initialize(client.java:13548) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:203) at server.main(server.java:49) ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1073 Client type: low memory version UserId: 45620747 pr1v4cy is signing onto server. [client-2-pr1v4cy]: pr1v4cy is already online. [/code]
how do i fix that?

item.title: Error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @pr1v4cy pr1v4cy
item.description:
@pr1v4cy wrote:

legendzpker i figured it out

you must have something that the server cant support like the person that says your online only have of the thing is there or an item the server cant have or the starting equipment for your chars has a nonexistent item in it or anything just compile and if it doesnt show it as an error then just go through your .java’s very carefully and look at every little thing youll find it eventually…best wishes and hope you figure it out

and legendz he tryed atleast lol you got to give him credit for that everyone that even looked at this prolly just laughed at us and exited out of it…so atleast he tried to help…

Read full topic

item.title: Error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

vraj82192:

You will have to restart your server. If your using Ultimate PK scape, you have to add this one thing like I did. I forgot what it was now though. Sorry. All I got to say is restart it.

U DIDENT HELP him he wants it gone because i know hwo he feels when he always has to restart his server espcially when hes not there so if u cant help dont post at all

Read full topic
